Public NotInheritable Class OleDbCommand Inherits DbCommand Implements ICloneable, IDisposable
public ref class OleDbCommand sealed : System::Data::Common::DbCommand, ICloneable, IDisposable
type OleDbCommand = class inherit DbCommand interface ICloneable interface IDbCommand interface IDisposable

summary.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source.

span.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體時建立時，讀取/寫入屬性會設為其初始值。When an instance of is created, the read/write properties are set to their initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 具有執行命令，在資料來源的下列方法： features the following methods executing commands at a data source: |項目Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||執行傳回資料列的命令。Executes commands that return rows. 可能不會有效果，如果您想要執行命令，例如 SQL SET 陳述式。 may not have the effect that you want if used to execute commands such as SQL SET statements.| ||執行命令，例如 SQL 插入、 刪除、 更新和 SET 陳述式。Executes commands such as SQL INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.| ||擷取單一值，例如，從資料庫的彙總值。Retrieves a single value, for example, an aggregate value from a database.| 您可以重設屬性和重複使用物件。You can reset the property and reuse the object. 不過，您必須關閉然後您才能執行新的或上一個命令。However, you must close the before you can execute a new or previous command. 如果嚴重（例如，SQL Server 嚴重性層級 20 或更新版本） 所執行的方法產生，則，可能會關閉連線。If a fatal (for example, a SQL Server severity level of 20 or greater) is generated by the method executing an , the , the connection may be closed. 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. ## Examples 下列範例會使用，以及和來選取資料列從 Access 資料庫。The following example uses the , along and , to select rows from an Access database. 區域分布再傳回。The filled is then returned. 此範例會傳遞初始化，連接字串、 SQL SELECT 陳述式的查詢字串和來源資料庫資料表名稱的字串。The example is passed an initialized , a connection string, a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the source database table. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Tries to cancel the execution of an .

span.span: Tries to cancel the execution of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有要取消的作業，則不會發生任何狀況。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing occurs. 不過，如果正在進行命令，而取消作業的嘗試失敗，則不會產生任何例外狀況 (Exception)。However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，會執行它，然後取消執行。The following example creates an , executes it, and then cancels the execution. 若要這麼做，方法會傳遞為 SQL SELECT 陳述式的字串和要用來連接到資料來源的字串。To accomplish this, the method is passed a string that is an SQL SELECT statement and a string to use to connect to the data source. summary.span: Gets or sets the SQL statement or stored procedure to execute at the data source.

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL statement or stored procedure to execute at the data source.

value.span: 要執行的 SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

span.span: The SQL statement or stored procedure to execute.
The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`，則屬性應設為預存程序的名稱。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 使用者可能需要使用逸出字元語法，如果預存程序名稱包含任何特殊字元。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters. 命令執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫其中一個`Execute`方法。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the `Execute` methods. 當設定為`TableDirect`，則屬性應該設定為資料表或資料表的名稱來存取。When is set to `TableDirect`, the property should be set to the name of the table or tables to be accessed. 使用者可能需要的任何具名資料表包含任何特殊字元時，請使用逸出字元語法。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if any of the named tables contain any special characters. 會傳回所有資料列和資料行的具名的資料表或資料表，當您呼叫其中一個`Execute`方法。All rows and columns of the named table or tables will be returned when you call one of the `Execute` methods. 您無法設定， ，和如果目前的連接正在執行 execute 或提取作業的屬性。You cannot set the , , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. OLE DB.NET 提供者不支援具名的參數來傳遞參數至 SQL 陳述式或被呼叫的預存程序時設定為`Text`。The OLE DB.NET Provider does not support named parameters for passing parameters to an SQL Statement or a stored procedure called by an when is set to `Text`. 在此情況下，您必須使用問號 （？） 預留位置。In this case, the question mark (?) placeholder must be used. 例如: For example: `SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ?` 因此，順序物件加入至必須直接對應至問號預留位置參數的位置。Therefore, the order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 設定參數和參數資料類型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其部分屬性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.CommandText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.CommandText Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.CommandText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.CommandText Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating an attempt to execute a command and generating an error.

span.span: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating an attempt to execute a command and generating an error.

value.span: 等待命令執行的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The time (in seconds) to wait for the command to execute.
The default is 30 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為 0 表示無限制，並應避免在因為嘗試執行命令會無限期等候。A value of 0 indicates no limit, and should be avoided in a because an attempt to execute a command will wait indefinitely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定屬性，以`StoredProcedure`，您應該設定預存程序名稱的屬性。When you set the property to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the name of the stored procedure. 當您呼叫 Execute 方法的其中一個命令會執行這個預存程序。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods. ，和屬性 nelze nastavit，pokud 目前連接正在執行 execute 或擷取作業。The , and properties cannot be set if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. OLE DB.NET 提供者不支援具名的參數來傳遞參數至 SQL 陳述式或被呼叫的預存程序當會設定為 Text。The OLE DB .NET Provider does not support named parameters for passing parameters to an SQL statement or a stored procedure called by an when is set to Text. 在此情況下，您必須使用問號 （？） 預留位置。In this case, the question mark (?) placeholder must be used. 例如: For example: `SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ?` 因此，順序物件加入至必須直接對應至問號預留位置參數的位置。Therefore, the order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 設定參數和參數資料類型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

summary.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.
The number of rows affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用來執行資料庫目錄作業，例如，來查詢資料庫的結構或建立資料庫物件，例如資料表、 或變更資料庫中的資料，而不需使用執行 UPDATE、 INSERT 或 DELETE陳述式。You can use the to perform catalog operations, for example, to query the structure of a database or to create database objects such as tables, or to change the data in a database without using a by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 雖然傳回任何資料列時，任何輸出參數或傳回對應至參數的值會填入資料。Although the returns no rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. UPDATE、 INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式的傳回值會是命令影響的資料列數目。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 對於所有其他類型的陳述式，傳回的值為-1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1. 發生復原時，傳回的值也是-1。If a rollback occurs, the return value is also -1. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，然後執行它使用。The following example creates an and then executes it using . 此範例會傳遞字串，例如 UPDATE、 INSERT 或 DELETE 的 SQL 陳述式和字串，用來連接到資料來源。The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement such as UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE, and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: Sends the to the , and builds an using one of the values.

span.span: Sends the to the , and builds an using one of the values.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定具有方法物件、.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 執行使用 OLE DB 的繫結**IRow**介面是否可用。When you specify with the method of the object, the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB performs binding using the OLE DB **IRow** interface if it is available. 否則，它會使用**IRowset**介面。Otherwise, it uses the **IRowset** interface. 如果您的 SQL 陳述式要傳回單一資料列時，請指定也可以改善應用程式的效能。If your SQL statement is expected to return only a single row, specifying can also improve application performance. 當屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`，則屬性應設為預存程序的名稱。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 命令執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫。The command executes this stored procedure when you call . 支援特殊的模式，可讓大型二進位值，有效率地讀取。The supports a special mode that enables large binary values to be read efficiently. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < `SequentialAccess` 設定。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 在關閉之前，先關閉物件。Before you close the , first close the object. 您也必須關閉如果您打算重複使用的物件物件。You must also close the object if you plan to reuse an object. 如果會透過設為`CloseConnection`，正在關閉自動關閉連線。If the is created with set to `CloseConnection`, closing the closes the connection automatically. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，然後執行它，藉由傳遞的 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 陳述式的字串和要用來連接到資料來源的字串。The following example creates an , and then executes it by passing a string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the data source. 設定為 。 is set to . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader2/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteReader2/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ExecuteScalar() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ExecuteScalar () As Object

summary.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

summary.span: Additional columns or rows are ignored.

span.span: Additional columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference if the result set is empty.

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference if the result set is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來擷取單一值，例如，彙總的值，從資料來源。Use the method to retrieve a single value, for example, an aggregate value, from a data source. 這需要較少的程式碼比使用方法，並接著執行作業以產生單一值所傳回的資料所需。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations that are required to generate the single value using the data returned by an . 一般查詢可以進行格式化，如下列 C# 範例所示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM region"; Int32 count = (int32) ExecuteScalar(); ``` ## Examples 下列範例會建立，然後執行它使用。The following example creates an and then executes it using . 此範例會傳遞為彙總的結果，傳回的 SQL 陳述式的字串和要用來連接到資料來源的字串。The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement that returns an aggregate result, and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteScalar/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteScalar/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As OleDbParameterCollection

summary.span: Gets the .

span.span: Gets the .

value.span: SQL 陳述式或預存程序的參數。

span.span: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks OLE DB.NET 提供者不支援具名的參數來傳遞參數至 SQL 陳述式或被呼叫的預存程序時設定為`Text`。The OLE DB .NET Provider does not support named parameters for passing parameters to an SQL statement or a stored procedure called by an when is set to `Text`. 在此情況下，您必須使用問號 （？） 預留位置。In this case, the question mark (?) placeholder must be used. 例如: For example: `SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ?` 因此，順序物件加入至必須直接對應至問號預留位置參數的命令文字中的位置。Therefore, the order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter in the command text. > [!NOTE] > 如果在集合中的參數不相符的查詢執行的需求，可能會產生錯誤。If the parameters in the collection do not match the requirements of the query to be executed, an error may result. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 設定參數和參數資料類型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立並顯示其參數。The following example creates an and displays its parameters. 若要這麼做，方法會傳遞，為 SQL SELECT 陳述式和陣列的查詢字串物件。To accomplish this, the method is passed an , a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and an array of objects. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Parameters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Parameters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Parameters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Parameters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Prepare() cil managed

summary.span: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.

span.span: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`TableDirect`，不執行任何動作。If the property is set to `TableDirect`, does nothing. 如果設定為`StoredProcedure`，以呼叫應該會成功，雖然它可能會不讓執行任何作業。If is set to `StoredProcedure`, the call to should succeed, although it may cause a no-op. 在呼叫之前，準備的陳述式中指定每個參數的資料類型。Before you call , specify the data type of each parameter in the statement to be prepared. 針對每個可變長度資料類型的參數，您必須設定**大小**所需的最大大小的屬性。For each parameter that has a variable length data type, you must set the **Size** property to the maximum size needed. 如果不符合這些條件，則會傳回錯誤。 returns an error if these conditions are not met. 如果您呼叫`Execute`方法之後呼叫，任何大於所指定之值的參數值**大小**屬性會自動截斷為指定的原始大小，為參數，且沒有會傳回截斷錯誤。If you call an `Execute` method after you call , any parameter value that is larger than the value specified by the **Size** property is automatically truncated to the original specified size of the parameter, and no truncation errors are returned. 輸出參數 （不論是否已備妥） 必須有使用者指定的資料類型。Output parameters (whether prepared or not) must have a user-specified data type. 如果您指定的可變長度資料類型時，您也必須指定最大值**大小**。If you specify a variable length data type, you must also specify the maximum **Size**. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並開啟連接。The following example creates an and opens the connection. 範例會藉由傳遞字串，是 SQL SELECT 陳述式和字串，用來連接到資料來源，然後準備資料來源上的預存程序。The example then prepares a stored procedure on the data source by passing a string that is an SQL SELECT statement and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不能設定如果它已經設為特定的值，因此命令執行程序中的屬性。You cannot set the property if it is already set to a specific value, and the command is in the process of executing. 如果您設定交易屬性未連線到相同的物件做為物件時，下次您嘗試執行陳述式擲回例外狀況。If you set the transaction property to an object that is not connected to the same as the object, an exception is thrown the next time that you try to execute a statement.
